| HistoryText             = Demon-Fire was a satanic cult under the control of [[Apocalypse (Mr.Kazarian) (Earth-616)|Apocalypse]], operating out of [[San Franciso]]; [[Malevolence (Maine)|Malevolence]], [[Maine (State)|Maine]]; and [[Gallow's Bend]].
